channel.title: Rsps risks?
channel.description: what are the risks of opening a pserver will i get sued by jagex if i open up a p server also will i get sued if i make poeple mod for money?

item.title: Rsps risks?
item.dc:creator: @MarkUp MarkUp
item.description:
@MarkUp wrote:

They can take your site down, warn you to shut down your server, sue you etc.But its rare for that to happen ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps risks?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

darkhiit:

what are the risks of opening a pserver will i get sued by jagex if i open up a p server also will i get sued if i make poeple mod for money?

You don’t have anything to worry about, until you start getting 100-200 people on, and are getting tons of donations. Until then your most likely safe.

Read full topic
